  • public class ChooseAllyGUI
extends com.erebos.engine.entity.ImageEntity
    GUI for displaying and updating when teams need to choose allies.

      • adjucate

        public java.lang.String adjucate()
        Checks if two Players selected each other as allies. If both of their supply center counts added together is greater than or equal to 24 they are both determined to be winners
        Returns:
        the winners, null if none were found.
